description.translate: There you will stay, without ever rising or sinking. But then you'll excel.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Horizon\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Là tu resteras, sans jamais t'élever\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ni t'enfoncer. Mais là tu excelleras.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7There you will stay, without ever rising\"}","{\"text\":\"§7or sinking. But then you'll excel.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7HAS§a3 §7HER§a1\"}"]}}
